field.label: Listen Port
field.help: Set the port chrony listen to.

field.label: NTS Client Support
field.help: Enable NTS in client mode. This will add another layer of security for peers when OPNsense is the client. Every server in Peers has to support NTS.

field.label: NTS Disable Certcheck
field.help: If you run NTS mode you can enable this option in order to ignore wrong time in certificates for the first check. This helps if your system starts with wrong time.

field.label: NTP Peers
field.help: Set as many NTP peers you need.

field.label: Fallback Peer
field.help: Set fallback peer if you use NTS and your system starts with wrong time. Best to only use this for internal trusted peers.

field.label: Allowed Networks
field.help: Set the networks allowed to synchronize time with this server. If this value is not set it will also not listen to the port and just synchronize the time for itself.
